title: Noah Is Here! Plus: A Eulogy for Bennett
description:
“The Bachelorette’s” Noah joins Rachel and Becca to share how he feels about being portrayed as the villain on this season of the show. Noah addresses the backlash he’s received about his age, reveals the truth about his beef with Bennett, and gives fans a sneak peek into what’s to come on this season’s Men Tell All.  

But first, Rachel gives a moving (and hilarious) eulogy for fan favorite Bennett from Harvard. 

“Bachelor Happy Hour” has exclusive interviews every week. Watch “The Bachelorette” on ABC and listen to “Bachelor Happy Hour” the next morning. 

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
